remarks: If a function has its values in a Hausdorff space, then it has at most one limit value.  (Contributed by FL, 14-Nov-2010.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
hausflf.x $e |- X = U. J $.
hausflf $p |- ( ( J e. Haus /\ L e. ( Fil ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) -> E* x x e. ( ( J fLimf L ) ` F ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d J x $.
$d L x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
